name: Bell of the hess
description:
This game was created for our first participation to a game jam.

It was created with Python and Pygame in 1 week.

Although it is not 100% finished, we are proud to show you what we have achieved.

Rules :

You control an easter bell that has lost its power to distribute chocolates. You find yourself in a school with lots of children who just want to eat chocolate.

Some of them are just sad that they can't eat it, while others will want to eat YOU.

Your goal will be to use your magic to make the sad kids happy.

When the cheeky ones try to eat you, lead them to the teacher, he will put them back in place. You can then take charge of them.

The controls :

The game is played with the directional arrows and the space bar.

The arrows are used to move.

The space bar is used to use your power to make sad children happy.

You will find the link to the source code of the project: LeratPablo/Bell-of-the-hess: Game created for The Pygame Community Easter Jam 2023! (github.com)

And you can download an executable of the project on this page.
